prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and a smooth, aquatic body.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to swim and has vibrant blue coloring with orange accents.
Imagine a small amphibious creature that enjoys muddy environments and has a cheerful expression.
Design a Pokemon with a tail fin and cute facial features, perfect for a water habitat.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves into a larger creature, starting as an adorable baby.
Give me an aquatic Pokemon that thrives in wetland areas and has distinctive orange gills.
Make a friendly water-type Pokemon that is often found in ponds and streams.
